turns.content: Hi Grandpa, it's me! Don't you recognize my voice? I'm calling about something urgent.

OhI'm sorry, I don't think we've spoken before. Can you tell me your name and how you know me? It sounds a bit like one of the grandkids but I can't be sure.
Are your parents around by any chance? Maybe they could come to the phone for a minute?
I'll just put your call on hold real quick, honey. Mom or Dad might recognize you better than me.

No no, don't do that Grandpa! It's really important I talk to you right now. This is about some trouble with the IRS and they want to speak directly to a family member who can sort it out immediately. Please, just try to remember where you might know this voice from?

Oh dear, okay...let me think for a moment. The IRS needs to talk to us? That sounds serious.
Can you tell me more about what they want exactly?
I'll need to get your parents involved though. This is too big for just me to handle alone.
But before I do that, could you maybe spell out your full name and where we might know each other from?
And how did the IRS get your number? It sounds strange.
Let's calm down a bit and think about this properly okay?

It's alright Grandpa, take it easy. My name is Thomas Mitchell and I'm with the Internal Revenue Service. This isn't about me but I need to speak directly to someone who can clear this up right now. We have your grandson's information here showing unpaid taxes from last year that needs immediate attention or there could be serious consequences like an arrest warrant being issued.
I really need you to listen carefully because we're only giving you one hour before taking more drastic measures. The easiest way to resolve this is by purchasing a few Best Buy gift cards for $4850, then calling back with the card numbers so we can process it and clear everything up right away.
Can you do that for me please Grandpa? It's really important.

Oh my, I see. That does sound very serious indeed. A warrant could be issued if this isn't dealt with promptly?
I'll need to go get your grandma now though - she might remember more about any issues from last year.
This is a lot of money you're asking for though, isn't it? Let me just step outside and talk to her okay?
We can figure out what to do next after we speak together. I promise I won't make any calls or purchases until I've talked things through with your grandma first.

No Grandpa, that's not a good idea at all. You need to resolve this right now before the deadline passes and the situation escalates even further. Remember, we're only giving you one hour for this payment. After that, there will be no turning back.
Please don't waste time talking to anyone else about this. I know it's tough but this has to happen quickly so your grandson doesn't face legal trouble. Just go ahead and get those gift cards now from Best Buy or any other retailer that sells them.
Once you have the cards, give me a call back with the numbers on the front of each card and we'll take care of everything.
Trust me Grandpa, it's much better to handle this quickly than let it drag on. You can do this for your grandson, right?

Alright, alrightI understand how urgent this is then. Letting it go untreated could cause real problems as you say.
I'll head over to the nearest store myself and see if they have gift cards in such amounts available. It's a bit of drive though so I might be late getting back here before that one hour is up - can we extend just a little time please?
Also, once I get these cards, do I need to call you right away with their numbers or wait until I'm home again where it's quiet and we can talk without interruptions?
Thanks for understanding this situation so clearly. I'll try my best to resolve this quickly as instructed.

Listen closely Grandpa, there are no extensions on these deadlines. You need to make sure you have the gift cards within this hour or else you risk severe penalties including arrest warrants being issued.
Once you purchase them, go straight back home and call me immediately with the card numbers so we can process these right away. Don't wait any longer than necessary because time is running out fast.
Do you understand what needs to happen next?

Yes, I understand perfectly now. No delays - just head straight there after speaking to Grandma briefly one last time to confirm all details are correct with her too.
Will call back as soon as possible once I have the cards and numbers ready. Thank you for clarifying everything so clearly.
On my way right away.

Good, that's what we need to hear Grandpa. Act fast and everything will be taken care of smoothly. Remember, this is crucial for your grandson's sake. Call us back as soon as possible with the gift card numbers.
Stay safe on your trip and let's resolve this quickly. We're here to help you out of this situation properly.

Will do my best to act swiftly and safely. Thank you again for all your help in sorting this urgent matter so promptly.
Heading over now to get those cards. See you soon with the numbers ready.
Stay on standby please.
We'll be here waiting, Grandpa. Take care and resolve this as quickly as possible. Safe travels and see you back on the line shortly.

Thanks for your support and understanding. I appreciate it greatly.
Heading out now to get those gift cards right away.
Will call back with everything sorted soon.
Stay there until then, please.
On my way.
Alright Grandpa, stay safe and we'll be here when you're ready to give us the numbers. See you soon.

Thank you, I will.
Heading out now.
See you shortly.
Bye for now.
